laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased to 29.0% on Admission, 33.3% on 15th Day, 33.0% on 7th Day, and 33.1% on Admission.
Remained the same at 9.8 g/dL on Admission, increased to 11.3 g/dL on 15th Day, decreased to 10.7 g/dL on 7th Day, and decreased further to 10.5 g/dL on Admission.
Increased to 10,100/mm3 on Admission, 15,700/mm3 on 15th Day, 19,300/mm3 on 7th Day, and further increased to 44,700/mm3 on Admission.
Decreased to 370,000/mm3 on Admission, 284,000/mm3 on 15th Day, decreased to 209,000/mm3 on 7th Day, and further decreased to 86,000/mm3 on Admission.
Increased to 1.10 mg/dL on Admission, decreased to 0.93 mg/dL on 15th Day, increased to 2.51 mg/dL on 7th Day.
Increased to 38 mg/dL on Admission, 44 mg/dL on 15th Day, and 117 mg/dL on 7th Day.
Decreased to 134 U/L on Admission, increased to 875 U/L on 15th Day, decreased to 257 U/L on 7th Day, and decreased further to 70 U/L on Admission.
Increased to 295 U/L on Admission, further increased to 1275 U/L on 15th Day, decreased to 743 U/L on 7th Day, and decreased further to 108 U/L on Admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: LVEF estimated at 40% before procedure, rose to 65-70% after the procedure.
